ActivityMetadata.Name: PD Get a user
ActivityMetadata.Label: PD Get a user
ActivityMetadata.Description:
Get details about an existing user.
Users are members of a PagerDuty account that have the ability to interact with Incidents and other data on the account.
For more information see the [API Concepts Document](../../docs/CONCEPTS.md#users)
ActivityMetadata.HelpHtml:
# PagerDuty

Get a user

Get details about an existing user. Users are members of a PagerDuty account that have the ability to interact with Incidents and other data on the account. For more information see the [API Concepts Document](../../docs/CONCEPTS.md#users)

Method: Get

OperationID: getUser

EndPoint:

/users/{id}
